description: NotebookLM is Google's AI research assistant that analyzes your uploaded documents and can turn them into AI-generated podcast conversations. NotebookLM is Google's AI-powered research and note-taking tool that allows you to upload documents, PDFs, videos, and web pages, then ask questions grounded entirely in your sources. Its viral 'Audio Overview' feature generates realistic two-host podcast conversations summarizing your research materials. Free to use with a Google account. Highlights: Grounded AI responses (no hallucinations). Audio Overview podcast generation. Multiple document types supported. Free with Google account. Source citations for every answer.
